metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3019 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A DMA reentrancy issue leading to a use-after-free error was found in the e1000e NIC emulation code in QEMU. This issue could allow a privileged guest user to crash the QEMU process on the host, resulting in a denial of service.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-10-12, the proposed patch has not yet been accepted upstream, marking as deferred

criterions.comment: qemu package in trusty is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-10-12').
